name: Never remove a standard page from component (PeopleSoft)
description: Identify each page in the Vanille component not in the project environment
output: Failed checks give the number of components that contain deleted page. The page name (detected in the vanilla) can be found in the value column
rationale:
Standard objects are often referenced in many parts of the system. Deleting one of them can impact every part of the system that access to it.
Unneeded pages in the component should be hidden
remediation: Restore the page in the component from the Vanilla
alternativeName: Never remove a standard page from component (PeopleSoft)
